entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
